answerText: differential equations[10] This method of solving partial differential equations assumes that the solution will be a product of a set of functions of single variables; that product solution is put into the original equation.

subject: Science
question: Question: The heat equation and the wave equation are examples of the "partial" equations of this type. For 10 points each: [10] Name this type of equation whose terms contain a function and its derivatives of various orders.
